title: Playin Annie support, with an Ashe ADC
body:
Before the first minion wave was dead, I was gone. Dude was just attack-moving into the minion wave, not last-hitting at all.
Soooo I got mobo boots and roamed top and mid. Fed the fuck out of our Nasus and Viktor. Ashe was spamming "report troll Annie" the whole time.

So when do people realize that when your support starts roaming, it's probably better for the team?
Cuz rn I swear I'm in bronze elo
